page.title: 03NEW SHOPS IN OUR AREA.
page.content: There are two shops which have just opened in our area.They are called 'Priory Windows 'and the 'V.H.S. Video Shop'.Priory Windows have taken the Motor Shop's place,and the Video Shop has taken the Garden Centre's place.The video shop has lots of video tapes and some computer tapes such as 'Bullseye', 'Chiller'and 'Plus One'for the Spectrum 16k/48k.There are a variety of Plus one games.When you buy it you get 2 free games with it.There are all kinds of videos like comedy,western,horror and adult videos.You can also buy T.V.'s in there and video recorders.Also there are carpets for sale.The 'Video Shop' is next to the 'Co Op' in Bowburn.'Priory Windows' are on the left hand side of the A177 into Durham.
